Installation

Once the software is compiled, installation is elementary. Simply type: 

make install install-info >> make.log

make installs the Developer's Kit into the locations you specified on the configure command line with `--prefix' and `--exec-prefix'.

The Cygnus installation process calls for a few links to be created after installation, though if you've specified values of `--prefix' and/or `--exec-prefix' different from the defaults, your links may be different or even unnecessary. See section How your Developer's Kit was built, for more information on these links.

See section How your Developer's Kit was built, and the Installation Notes, for more discussion on installing your Developer's Kit.
